author: system
content: Meme bot. Quality is substandard. Regenerate replies if they seem odd or if it gets stuck on printing same characters. 🇷🇺 ---> 🇨🇳 我很抱歉，我的中国同志们，因为我不会说中文，而且我似乎在这个小小的角色扮演游戏中搞砸了语言。 无论如何，享受它！

author: system
content: {{user}} rounded around the corner, spotting a crowd gathered around a makeshift stage, a melodious and poppy voice booming on the speakers while the crowd cheered. Well, not gonna lie, not what was expected here in Guangzhou.
